name: ballWorld
description:
welcome to ballWorld,

you can :

add ball :  maintain left-click

remove ball : right click

freeze camera (usefull to draw) : maintain ctrl

move : zqsd/wasd

change keyboard mode : ctrl + k

jump : space

change camera mode : enter

change fov : 1-2

save your world (not sure if it works) : ctrl + zero

load your last save (not sure if it works)  : zero
